sites.name: Assessment

sites.compiledCss: #CU:hover, #workshop:hover, #OSL:hover {background: rgb(21, 28, 85)!important; cursor: pointer!important; opacity: 1!important;}#CU, #OSL, #workshop {background: black!important; opacity: 0.7!important;}.content-nav-bar {display: none!important;}.popover .popover-inner {min-width: 100px!important; overflow: hidden!important;}#status {background: red!important; height: auto!important; position: fixed!important; top: 30%!important; right: 0px!important; z-index: 9999!important; color: rgb(255, 255, 255)!important; text-align: center!important;}#appraisalwindow, #assesswindow, #appointwindow, #datewindow, #reflectwindow, #reflection, #assess1 {padding: 13px 0px!important; width: 200px!important;}.matching {background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0)!important;}#last {background: red!important; height: auto!important; position: fixed!important; bottom: 0px!important; left: 0px!important; z-index: 9999!important; color: rgb(255, 255, 255)!important; text-align: center!important; padding: 13px 0px!important; width: 200px!important;}#assess1 {background: green!important; cursor: pointer!important;}#assess1:hover {background: rgb(0, 100, 0)!important;}.closing {background: url("https://shib.chalkandwire.com/ep2_smu/images/ui/ui-chevrons.png") 0px -32px no-repeat rgb(68, 65, 65)!important; border: 0px!important; color: rgb(255, 255, 255)!important; display: block!important; font-size: 1.8rem!important; line-height: 1.78!important; overflow: hidden!important; text-indent: -500px!important; width: 32px!important;}
sites.name: Placement

sites.compiledCss: #status {background: black!important; opacity: 0.9!important; height: auto!important; position: fixed!important; bottom: 0px!important; right: 0px!important; z-index: 9999!important; color: rgb(255, 255, 255)!important; text-align: center!important;}#wordcount, #name1, #name2, #GLOS, #approval, #copy1, #send1, #assess1 {padding: 13px 0px!important; width: 200px!important;}#copy1, #send1 {background: blue!important;}#reflection1 {padding: 13px 0px!important; width: auto!important;}#copy1:hover, #send1:hover, #assess1:hover {background: green!important;}#overall, #deptassess, #recommend {float: left!important; width: 33.33%!important;}#detail1::after {content: ""!important; display: table!important; clear: both!important;}#approval, #send1, #copy1, #assess1 {cursor: pointer!important;}#approval:hover {background: green!important;}#detail1 {width: calc(100% - 40px)!important; padding: 20px!important; z-index: 9990!important; color: rgb(0, 0, 0)!important; text-align: left!important; top: 0px!important; left: 0px!important; position: absolute!important; background: rgb(234, 234, 234)!important;}
sites.name: Reflection
